name: Slay the Minotaur
description:
Take on the role of many brave heroes as they each attempt to slay the Minotaur and save ancient Greece in this mythical roguelite!

The Minotaur is relentless and kills without mercy. Those who enter the labyrinth never return. Defeating the Minotaur will require careful planning and great skill in combat. Do you have what it takes to slay the Minotaur?


Find powerful weapons and helmets, each with a unique attribute and special move! Be it a devastating strike or casting powerful lightning bolts like Zeus! Although burned by the repeated failures of previous heroes, Aphrodite will help you slay the Minotaur by upgrading your agility and strength, or even granting you with new abilities! With her help you can become an unstoppable Minotaur slayer!


The Minotaur’s domain isn't home to just the Minotaur. Failed heroes of the past still walk the labyrinth’s halls as zombies. Giant cyclopes and other foul beings call the labyrinth their home. Defeat these mythical creatures to earn pearls that can be traded with Aphrodite to become stronger and to open chests containing powerful weaponry. If you want a chance at slaying the Minotaur, you must fight your way through the labyrinth!


Slaying the Minotaur is a battle in itself, but how quickly and efficiently you defeat the Minotaur is the real challenge for those who seek it. Earn ranks for each time you successfully slay the Minotaur. Race against the clock and slay the Minotaur in record time! Slay the Minotaur is all about replayability as you become a more and more legendary minotaur slayer!

GO FORTH AND SLAY THE MINOTAUR!


  • EXPLORE THE ANCIENT LABYRINTH FROM GREEK MYTHOLOGY!
  • FIGHT LEGENDARY CREATURES FROM GREEK MYTHOLOGY!
  • HIGHLY REPLAYABLE! EARN RANKS AND SET RECORD TIMES BY SLAY THE MINOTAUR!
  • FIND WEAPONS AND DISCOVER POWERFUL COMBINATIONS!
  • PLAY AS APHRODITE AND HERACLES IN 2 EXTRA MODES!
